body:
Hello guys, I'm making really good Minecraft Cartoons for everyone on Avicus who wants some! Just add me on skype if you haven't already: TheDiamondGecko 

If you haven't seen any of the work I do just check out my youtube channel because its the most efficent way of seeing my artwork! www.youtube.com/user/diamondgeckogames
body_tagged:

title: I'm making pro Cartoons for everyone!

replies.body:
Herru. I'd like one. :)

I'd like:

My skin, which is pretty much: A kid, with shaggy hair (IDK what color to call that, look at it xD), wearing a light gray hoodie, but with the sleeves of a T-shirt, jeans, gray eyes, sneakers, and a Quiver full of arrows.

So, that skin running, while holding a bow with a semi-charged back flamming arrow.

I'd also like if you could have a wolf running next to me, with a lapis-lazuli-blue collar.

Thanks!

Added you on Skype.
replies.body_tagged:
